results.title: Knot
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Pauline Spiering
results.brief_description: Fear is a powerful weapon. A story of control, of physical and verbal abuse and a knot that would not go away.

results.title: If you are not part of the solution...you are part of the problem
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Libby Lloyd
results.brief_description: Violence against women is possibly the most important, least examined and most taboo subject in our society. This film explores the beginnings of White Ribbon Day and the campaign to making it an important high profile public awareness day in Australia.
results.title_for_label: If you are not part of the solution…you are part of the problem
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Libby Lloyd
results.description: Violence against women is possibly the most important, least examined and most taboo subject in our society. This film explores the beginnings of White Ribbon Day and the campaign to making it an important high profile public awareness day in Australia.
description_for_label: Violence against women is possibly the most important, least examined and most taboo subject in our society. This film explores the beginnings of White Ribbon Day and the campaign to making it an important high profile public awareness day in Australia.

results.title: Finding me
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Joy Chivers
results.brief_description: Through years of domestic violence Joy existed in the silence of the shadows, afraid to cry out, to seek help, to seek support. Broken bones and bruises heal but the emotional scarring lasts a lifetime.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Joy Chivers
results.description: Through years of domestic violence Joy existed in the silence of the shadows, afraid to cry out, to seek help, to seek support. Broken bones and bruises heal but the emotional scarring lasts a lifetime.
description_for_label: Through years of domestic violence Joy existed in the silence of the shadows, afraid to cry out, to seek help, to seek support. Broken bones and bruises heal but the emotional scarring lasts a lifetime.

results.title: Lesson plan
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Jeannine le Vaillant-Moffitt
results.brief_description: I have no “me” memories of my childhood aged before 7, but many memories of my siblings. A story of memories, family, love and acceptance.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Jeannine le Vaillant-Moffitt
results.description: I have no “me” memories of my childhood aged before 7, but many memories of my siblings. A story of memories, family, love and acceptance.
description_for_label: I have no “me” memories of my childhood aged before 7, but many memories of my siblings. A story of memories, family, love and acceptance.

results.title: Stripped
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Dinky
results.brief_description: Emotional put-downs can wreak havoc on you as a person, stripping you of your independence, confidence, your mind, dignity and self-respect. It takes a long time to recover and rebuild your life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Dinky
results.description: Emotional put-downs can wreak havoc on you as a person, stripping you of your independence, confidence, your mind, dignity and self-respect. It takes a long time to recover and rebuild your life.

results.title: Violence against women as a men's issue
results.creator_credit: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Adam Hasandedic
results.brief_description: One 40 year-old “black sheep” coming to terms with his life - finding his way from trauma as his teacher through to love as his new mentor.
results.title_for_label: Violence against women as a men’s issue
results.creator_credit_for_label: Center for Digital Storytelling US, ACMI and Adam Hasandedic
results.description: One 40 year-old “black sheep” coming to terms with his life - finding his way from trauma as his teacher through to love as his new mentor.

results.title: Possums of Bonegilla
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Agnes Karlik
results.brief_description: Agnes talks of her migrant experience including her time spent at Bonegilla. She especially focuses on friendships made during those early years of alienation and loneliness.
results.description: Agnes talks of her migrant experience including her time spent at Bonegilla. She especially focuses on friendships made during those early years of alienation and loneliness.
description_for_label: Agnes talks of her migrant experience including her time spent at Bonegilla. She especially focuses on friendships made during those early years of alienation and loneliness.

results.title: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray 'Tongola'
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and George Nelson
results.brief_description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.
results.title_for_label: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray ‘Tongola’
results.description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.
